skills.skill: Business and Accounting Principles (US GAAP & IFRS)

duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate the monthly financial reporting process and deadlines.
Maintain accounting department priorities and strategic initiatives.
Prepare the monthly close, including consolidation entries, income allocation and distribution waterfall calculations, and IFRS and GAAP financial statements.
Review and manage general ledger activity for partnership-level entities.
Oversee annual budgets with consolidation and tie-out.
Assist with special projects related to the monthly close reporting process, budgets, internal audit, external audit, and investor and lender requirements.
